of them had visits in the second week as well. 
Keeping infants warm: No randomized or quasi-randomized trials that evaluated the 
impact of keeping infants warm after discharge (hospital births) or after 24 hours (home 
births) were identified. 
Hygienic skin care: No eligible studies were identified.
Hygienic cord care: Three eligible RCTs that enrolled over 50 000 babies were identified
